entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending early this evening then cloudy and 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
